about_the_game:
Fullback Simulator is an ultra-realistic simulator of the fullback role in American football … no, not really.

This game, born to relax its developer between lines of code, aims to relax the player while stimulating his reflexes and tactical foresight along an infinite football field.

Have fun customizing your fullback, giving him physical characteristics, and then improving him over time, game after game.

Sprint, dodge, jump, headbutt your opponents, and earn the Beast Mode to break through any defense!

After the first 300 yards, the only thought on your mind is going to be: "Come on, another ten yards... just ten more yards!"

name: Fullback Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Take on the fullback role and conquer as many yards as possible! Create your fullback, customize it, make it better game after game ... and smash it all in Beast Mode!
supported_languages: English, Italian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
